HOME

Hi! My name is Theo Olausson and I'm a 3rd year Informatics student at the University of Edinburgh.

I'm interested in computer architecture, natural language processing, and many other aspects of computer science.

In my free time I play the guitar. I'm also very passionate about the environment and ensuring that technology is used to improve the wellbeing of all.
